UniprotID	Q99943
Accession	Q99943;A2BFI5;Q5BL03
EntryName	PLCA_HUMAN
ProteinName	1-acyl-sn-glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase alpha (EC 2.3.1.51) (1-acylglycerol-3-phosphate O-acyltransferase 1) (1-AGP acyltransferase 1) (1-AGPAT 1) (Lysophosphatidic acid acyltransferase alpha) (LPAAT-alpha) (Protein G15)
GeneName	AGPAT1 G15
Length	283
Function	Converts 1-acyl-sn-glycerol-3-phosphate (lysophosphatidic acid or LPA) into 1,2-diacyl-sn-glycerol-3-phosphate (phosphatidic acid or PA) by incorporating an acyl moiety at the sn-2 position of the glycerol backbone.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
